channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Bags just dumped, 26th February
item.description:
Last night I saw some bags just dumped by the fence that's opposite Laxton Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 28 Laxton Road, Hucclecote

item.title: Road severely degrading, 25th February

item.title: Pothole jct 11a south middle lane, 25th February
item.description:

item.title: Dangerous road surface, 24th February
item.description:
This entire section of road is littered with holes & broken road surface. It is getting worse by the day. Cars, bikes, lorries etc. are having to swerve around them to avoid damaging their vehicles which is dangerous but totally understandable.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 19 Springbank Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytip at Location - added to!, 24th February
item.description:
The location is the entrance to the Old Quarry off Cleeve Common Road - the entrance to the footpath. A report of a tip here was made earlier this week which consists of wood, glass door, perspex roofing and plastic chairs. Another part is car parts. It does seem this tip has been added to. Please can this be removed as a matter of urgency?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Dingle, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
